definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: 20 the lampstands of pure gold with their lamps, to burn in front of the inner sanctuary as prescribed;
sentences.chinese: 并精金的灯台和灯盏，可以照例点在内殿前。

sentences.english: Regular hand washing should be carried out after caring for or visiting sick people.
sentences.chinese: 照顾或探访病人后应照例洗手。

sentences.english: I check my in-tray every morning as a matter of course.
sentences.chinese: 我照例每天早晨查看收文盘。

sentences.english: Mr Milton's answer to the question of the riot was a regular cop-out.
sentences.chinese: 对于发生暴乱的问题，密尔顿先生照例是避而不谈。

sentences.english: The crew had to do the routine safety demonstration and in-cabin service, all in twenty to twenty five minutes, for some seventy passengers.
sentences.chinese: 机组人员照例做了安全示范，之后在客舱提供服务。

sentences.english: On that day, like all other days, she was admonishing me to remember my place.
sentences.chinese: 那一天，她照例教训我要记住我的身份。

sentences.english: Then they took up their regular positions as prescribed in the Law of Moses the man of God.
sentences.chinese: 遵着神人摩西的律法，照例站在自己的地方。

sentences.english: Today the work meeting is being held in the meeting room on the third floor, as usual.
sentences.chinese: 今天的办公会议照例还是在三楼会议室召开。

sentences.english: Then move on to the next subject, and apply today's idea as before.
sentences.chinese: 然后再移向下一个对象，照例应用今天的观念。

sentences.english: As a rule, I find it difficult to take all this attention very seriously.
sentences.chinese: 照例，我觉得很难认真去对待这种关注。

sentences.english: Do you talk by rule then, while you are dancing?
sentences.chinese: 那么说，你跳起舞来照例总得要谈上几句吗？

sentences.english: Okay a brief recap of last week as usual.
sentences.chinese: 我们照例回顾一下上周的内容。

sentences.english: Do you talk as a rule while dancing?
sentences.chinese: 那么说，你跳起舞来照例总得要谈上几句吗？

sentences.english: She gave the customary speech of thanks to the chairman.
sentences.chinese: 她照例向主席致感谢辞。

sentences.english: There is always a certain flurry in a country-house on Sunday morning.
sentences.chinese: 在乡村居室里，星期天上午照例有一翻忙乱。

sentences.english: He rolled over and did his routine of three finger-tipped push-ups.
sentences.chinese: 他翻了个身，照例指尖撑地做了三下俯卧撑。

definition: at dawn/at first light/first thing in the morning
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
